title: T206 Pattee, Reulbach, Birmingham to trade
author: bigtrain

posts.post_title: T206 Pattee, Reulbach, Birmingham to trade
posts.post_content: Here are three cards I have available.  Two horizontals, Pattee SC150 and Birmingham Sov. 150 and Reulbach SC150 with a pinhole in the middle. I need about 250 T206 commons so am looking to trade. Let me know what you have available. Also pictured is a Starr, or rather about 85% of a Starr card that is torn in half.  I got this in an ebay lot.  I hate to throw it out so its free to the first person who is willing to pay postage.
Starr is gone. Horizontals on hold.  Reulbach still needs a new home.

Hi

I have these three including one with a neat back stamp.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=85901&d=1359425777[/IMG]
